Specimen Type: Sputum, tracheal aspirate, bronchoalveolar lavage fluid, bronchial washes/brushings
Purpose: To accurately identify and report bacterial pathogens in respiratory specimens from cystic fibrosis patients for effective treatment and management of infections.
Equipment: Incubators, culture media plates (blood agar, MacConkey/CLED, chocolate agar, mannitol salt agar, Sabouraud dextrose agar), antibiotic susceptibility testing discs, Gram stain reagents, microscope, sterile loops
